gridtype  = projection
gridsize  = 25800
xsize     = 200
ysize     = 129
xname     = rlon
xlongname = "rotated longitude"
xunits    = "degrees"
yname     = rlat
ylongname = "rotated latitude"
yunits    = "degrees"
xfirst    = -37.84
xinc      = 0.44
yfirst    = -22.88
yinc      = 0.44
grid_mapping = rotated_pole
grid_mapping_name = rotated_latitude_longitude
long_name = "coordinates of the rotated North Pole"
grid_north_pole_latitude = 60.31f
grid_north_pole_longitude = 141.38f
north_pole_grid_longitude = 180.f
